steps.name: I set the base URI

elements.name: User is able to get a resource

steps.name: I send the API request to get a resource
I should get the response status as 200
I should get  "userId" as "1" in response body
I should get  "id" as "1" in response body
I should get  "title" as "sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit" in response body

arguments.val: "sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit"

steps.name: I should get  "body" contains "quia et suscipit" in response body
I set the base URI

elements.name: User is able to get all the resources

steps.name: I send the API request to get all resources
I should get the response status as 200
I should get 100 objects in response
I set the base URI

elements.name: User is able to create a resource

steps.name: I add "title, body" as "foo, bar" to request parameters
I add "userId" as 1 to request parameters
I send the API "post" request to create a resource
I should get the response status as 201
I should get  "userId" as "1" in response body
I should get  "id" as "101" in response body
I should get  "title" as "foo" in response body
I should get  "body" contains "bar" in response body
I set the base URI

elements.name: User is able to update a resource

steps.name: I add "title, body" as "foo, bar" to request parameters
I add "userId" as 1 to request parameters
I add "id" as 1 to request parameters
I send the API "put" request to update a resource
I should get the response status as 200
I should get  "userId" as "1" in response body
I should get  "id" as "1" in response body
I should get  "title" as "foo" in response body
I should get  "body" contains "bar" in response body
I set the base URI

elements.name: User is able to patch a resource

steps.name: I add "title" as "foo" to request parameters
I send the API "patch" request to patch a resource
I should get the response status as 200
I should get  "userId" as "1" in response body
I should get  "id" as "1" in response body
I should get  "title" as "foo" in response body
I set the base URI

elements.name: User is able to delete a resource

steps.name: I send the API "delete" request to delete a resource
I should get the response status as 200
I am on To Do Home Page

elements.name: The User should be able to add tasks to the To Do list

steps.name: I enter "Task 1" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 1" is added to ToDo list
I enter "Task 2" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 2" is added to ToDo list
I should see total 2 items added to ToDo List
I should see 2 items left is displayed in the list footer
I am on To Do Home Page

elements.name: The User should be able to complete a task

steps.name: I enter "Task 1" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 1" is added to ToDo list
I complete the first task
I should see the first task is marked as completed
I am on To Do Home Page

elements.name: The User should be able to delete a task

steps.name: I enter "Task 1" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 1" is added to ToDo list
I delete the task
I should see the task is deleted from the list
I am on To Do Home Page

elements.name: The User should be able filter the task according to status

steps.name: I enter "Task 1" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 1" is added to ToDo list
I enter "Task 2" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 2" is added to ToDo list
I enter "Task 3" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 3" is added to ToDo list
I enter "Task 4" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 4" is added to ToDo list
I should see total 4 items in the ToDo List
I complete the first task
I click on "Active" filter
I should not see "Task 1" in the to do list
I should see total 3 items in the ToDo List
I click on "Completed" filter
I should not see "Task 2" in the to do list
I should not see "Task 3" in the to do list
I should not see "Task 4" in the to do list
I should see total 1 items in the ToDo List
I click on "All" filter
I should see total 4 items in the ToDo List
I am on To Do Home Page

elements.name: The User should be able to clear completed tasks from the list

steps.name: I enter "Task 1" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 1" is added to ToDo list
I enter "Task 2" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 2" is added to ToDo list
I enter "Task 3" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 3" is added to ToDo list
I should see total 3 items in the ToDo List
I complete the first task
I click on Clear completed link
I should see total 2 items in the ToDo List
I am on To Do Home Page

elements.name: The User should be able to edit a task

steps.name: I enter "Task 1" to ToDo list
I should see "Task 1" is added to ToDo list
I edit the task to "Updated Task 1"
I should see "Updated Task 1" is displayed in ToDo list
I am on To Do Home Page

elements.name: The User should be able to see all the required labels on home page

steps.name: I should see todos heading on the top of the page
I should see a textbox with "What needs to be done?" placeholder
I should see instructions "Double-click to edit a todo" in footer
I should see info "Created by petehunt" in footer
I should see info "Part of TodoMVC" in footer
